DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare lipid-altering effect MK0767 , glipizide , pioglitazone 12 week treatment . This early phase trial specific protocol information progress publicly available time . ( Full information available trial participant ) .
DOC.criteria: Men nonpregnant female Age great equal 21 year Stop current diabetes therapy ( applicable ) Stop current statin therapy ( applicable ) History type 1 diabetes mellitus ketoacidosis currently treat insulin Patients weight loss program ongoing weight loss , start intensive exercise program within last four week Patients require treatment corticosteroid 14 consecutive day Patients take warfarin warfarinlike anticoagulant Patients undergo surgery within 30 day Visit 1 Patients Hepatitis B , Hepatitis C , active liver gallbladder disease Patients history pancreatitis uncontrolled high blood pressure
